title: Helena Bonham Carter says she spoke to Princess Margaret using a psychic before playing her in The Crown
text:
Helena Bonham Carter has claimed that she spoke to Princess Margaret via a psychic to ask if she could play her in The Crown.

The response? That would be fine, the princess said, provided Bonham Carter smartened up a bit and learned how to wield a cigarette holder.

The Oscar-nominated actress said the “little chat” was nothing out of the ordinary for her because she always consults a psychic when portraying the lives of the deceased.

“She said, apparently, she was glad it was me,” Bonham Carter explained.

“When you play someone real, you really want their blessing because you do have a responsibility.
description: Helena Bonham Carter has claimed that she spoke to Princess Margaret via a psychic to ask if she could play her in The Crown.
